section.name: Overview
section.p:
This module is used to administer questionnaires. Its main features are
Supports many questionnaires concurrently
Supports multi-language versions of the same questionnaire
Questionnaires are displayed through a series of web pages. A web page contains one or more questions. The order of the displayed pages is driven by the order of the questions in the questionnaire.
The display of each question may be made to depend on answers to earlier questions (skip patterns)
Supports many types of questions / answers e.g. free text, single-selection, multi-selection, dropdown lists, boilerplates
Questions sharing answer categories may be displayed in a table format
Answers are validated according to unit rules and context (answers to previous questions)
Answers are persisted as answered and displayed when the questions are revisited. Answers to revisited questions may be changed and the dependent skip patterns modified accordingly.
